SourcedStatement: The Alameda County Registrar is scheduled to send the final ballot for printing on Friday.
Name: Alameda County Registrar

SourcedStatement: Lawyers for the county asked for the hearing to be moved up to today, to ensure there was enough time to create the ballots.
Name: Alameda County

SourcedStatement: The East Oakland Collective nonprofit cheered on the message.
Name: East Oakland Collective

SourcedStatement: “While we are disappointed by the court’s decision not to place us on the ballot in November, I remain undeterred in my commitment to serving Oakland and our communities,”
Name: Tonya Love
Title: former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife

SourcedStatement: She thanked the Oakland City Clerk and the city attorney for helping her through the process.
Name: Tonya Love
Title: former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife

SourcedStatement: “We are moving forward because our campaign is committed to fighting for equity and social justice for our community in District 7,”
Name: Tonya Love
Title: former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife

SourcedStatement: “My dedication to our city does not begin nor end with a campaign. There are many ways to effect change and ensure our voices are heard. I will continue to work alongside each of you, advocating for public health, safety, and equitable development in Oakland.”
Name: Tonya Love
Title: former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife

SourcedStatement: He was resigned to his failure to gather enough signatures–he picked up 37–but said he would work with whoever came out ahead in the race to help improve the community.
Name: David Newton
Title: nephew of Black Panther Party founder Huey Newton

SourcedStatement: Under the Voter’s Choice Act, registered voters on Election Day can cast their ballots at any vote center in Alameda County.
Name: Voter's Choice Act

SourcedStatement: Several community members and organizations such as the East Oakland Collective nonprofit cheered on the message.
Name: community members and organizations

SourcedStatement: Locals to physically work with city staff to put up road infrastructure, like traffic islands, that slows down roads and leads to fewer collisions.
Name: locals
